resources.string: Get to know what happens at your child’s school in real-time. Communicate with teachers and school administration in a structured manner that brings accountability.
Digitized Records on your Child (class attendance, performance etc.)
Paper based records can get lost & often could be manipulated if not misplaced. MyDarasa frees you from the worry of what was said and important records on your child’s class & school journey.
Automated Reminders of events & notices about your child.
Automated Reminders ensures you do not miss the important events and notices from your child’s class and school. You stay abreast of what is happening even when you are far away
Book tickets of any transportation and travel the world!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data
